comments.html:
Time and again in IT we see where blame is misdirected. When we embrace excuses and allow others to abdicate responsibility for which they were hired we end up with dire results. How many times do we see poor leadership blame a vendor or technology because the people operating it, do not understand what they are doing?

It is easy to blame Amazon for the exposed S3 bucket or a routing protocol for Internet instabilities. Ultimately people should be held to account. Thank you for continuing to promote expertise in our field.
